Àtụ:Infobox album
Africa to the World bụ abọm studio mbụ nke South African DJ Sun-El Musician, wepụtara na Eprel 20, 2018 site na EL World Music
Abọm ahụ nwetara akara ọla edo site na Recording Industry of South Africa (RiSA).
Africa to the World nwetara 8/10 ratings site na YoMzansi.

Africa to the World was nominated for Best Dance Album and Newcomer of the Year at the 25th South African Music Awards.

E wepụtara Africa to the World standard edition na Eprel 20, 2018.
A tọhapụrụ "Akanamali" na Mee 21, 2017 dị ka otu egwu nke abọm
Abụ ahụ rutere n'ọkwa nke mbụ na South Africa.
